articles.title: Nikola Jokic after Nuggets’ 11th straight win over Lakers: “Don’t get bored with success” - The Denver Post
articles.description: Call it championship masochism. The Nuggets are fighting their own complacency as much as the Lakers at this point in the lopsided matchup that dates back 11 games.
